This privacy policy document outlines what type of personal information is
collected and stored by _HomeOwnersHub_ and how it is used.

### Website Visitors

Like most website operators, _HomeOwnersHub_ collects non-personally-
identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically
make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site,
and the date and time of each visitor request.

_HomeOwnersHub_ 's purpose in
collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how
_HomeOwnersHub_ 's visitors use its website.

_HomeOwnersHub_ also collects potentially personally-identifying information
like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for logged in users and for users
leaving comments on _HomeOwnersHub_ forums.

### Gathering of Personally-Identifying Information

Certain visitors to _HomeOwnersHub_ 's websites choose to interact with
_HomeOwnersHub_ in ways that require _HomeOwnersHub_ to gather personally-
identifying information.

The amount and type of information that
_HomeOwnersHub_ gathers depends on the nature of the interaction.

For example,
we ask visitors who sign up for a forum user account at _HomeOwnersHub_ to
provide a username and email address.

In each case, _HomeOwnersHub_
collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to
fulfill the purpose of the visitor's interaction with _HomeOwnersHub_.

### Aggregated Statistics

_HomeOwnersHub_ may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its
websites.

_HomeOwnersHub_ uses cookies to help _HomeOwnersHub_ identify
and track visitors, their usage of _HomeOwnersHub_ website, and their website
access preferences.

These cookies allow the ad server to recognize
your computer each time they send you an online advertisement to compile
information about you or others who use your computer.
They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.

From time to time,
_HomeOwnersHub_ may release non-personally-identifying information in the
aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.

_HomeOwnersHub_ only discloses
logged in user and commenter IP addresses under the same circumstances that it
uses and discloses personally-identifying information as described below,
except that blog commenter IP addresses are visible and disclosed to the
administrators of the blog where the comment was left.

_HomeOwnersHub_ does not disclose personally-identifying information other
than as described below.

_HomeOwnersHub_ may display this information publicly or provide it
to others.

However, _HomeOwnersHub_ does not disclose personally-identifying
information other than as described below.

### Protection of Certain Personally-Identifying Information

_HomeOwnersHub_ discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-
identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors and
affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to
process it on _HomeOwnersHub_ 's behalf or to provide services available at
_HomeOwnersHub_ 's websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to
others.

Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may
be located outside of your home country; by using _HomeOwnersHub_ 's websites,
you consent to the transfer of such information to them.

_HomeOwnersHub_ will
not rent or sell potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying
information to anyone.

Other than to its employees, contractors and affiliated
organizations, as described above, _HomeOwnersHub_ discloses potentially
personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only in response
to a subpoena, court order or other governmental request, or when
_HomeOwnersHub_ believes in good faith that disclosure is reasonably necessary
to protect the property or rights of _HomeOwnersHub_ , third parties or the
public at large.

### Business Transfers

If _HomeOwnersHub_ , or substantially all of its assets were acquired, or in
the unlikely event that _HomeOwnersHub_ goes out of business or enters
bankruptcy, user information would be one of the assets that is transferred or
acquired by a third party.

You acknowledge that such transfers may occur, and
that any acquiror of _HomeOwnersHub_ may continue to use your personal
information as set forth in this policy.

This information allows
ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they
believe will be of most interest to you.

### DoubleClick DART Cookie

  * Third party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to HomeOwnersHub website.
* Google's use of the DoubleClick cookie enables it and its partners to serve ads to HomeOwnersHub users based on their visit to HomeOwnersHub and/or other sites on the Internet.

* Users may opt out of the use of the DoubleClick cookie for interest-based advertising by visiting [aboutads.info](http://aboutads.info)

Third-party ad servers or ad networks use technology to send the
advertisements and links that appear on _HomeOwnersHub_ directly to your
browsers.
